document.title: National Core Arts Standards for Theatre

jurisdiction.title: National Coalition for Core Arts Standards

25591812DEA645BE9AFFE286AACC5A89.description: Present and support an opinion about the social, cultural, and historical understandings of a drama/theatre work, based on critical research.

12C6DB1EA2D8473B84A2A6DC01DC4A4C.description: Justify the creative choices made in a devised or scripted drama/theatre work, based on a critical interpretation of specific data from theatre research.

A04AA38AB1F14C13AACAFBB45BEF5661.description: Connecting - Relate artistic ideas and works with societal, cultural and historical context to deepen understanding.

2A08D03DA7E042DD94226CC7AE21DA65.description: Develop a drama/theatre work that identifies and questions cultural, global, and historic belief systems.

A906910A29794B679ECBCAA4B98D899D.description: Connecting - Relate artistic ideas and works with societal, cultural and historical context to deepen understanding.

0121034A7AB3493EA3371EAAB0F74920.description: Collaborate on a drama/theatre work that examines a critical global issue using multiple personal, community, and cultural perspectives.

C2747B4FE55E43DB88E5A682C6D183E3.description: Connecting - Synthesize and relate knowledge and personal experiences to make art.

B6CEB230F093413B8F74E571B4B69475.description: Compare and debate the connection between a drama/theatre work and contemporary issues that may impact audiences.

E21418DC9E454076AB5D159F27A3D065.description: Analyze and evaluate varied aesthetic interpretations of production elements for the same drama/theatre work.

EFB4E0EFA107450AA0C3A8E04768246D.description: Research and synthesize cultural and historical information related to a drama/theatre work to support or evaluate artistic choices.

CDE8AB7908E2410B875400A5F4808CBD.description: Responding - Apply criteria to evaluate artistic work.

EAA6EDFCF3924A74B62589725BD118E0.description: Support and explain aesthetics, preferences, and beliefs to create a context for critical research that informs artistic decisions in a drama/theatre work.

5575BC6BCC12403FBA4DCA8DBA6CAA12.description: Use new understandings of cultures and contexts to shape personal responses to drama/theatre work.

78F9F594A76F452E85B2B071CF78CAED.description: Use detailed supporting evidence and appropriate criteria to revise personal work and interpret the work of others when participating in or observing a drama/ theatre work.

1AE170D45E9F41F18A520E0F35851DB7.description: Responding - Interpret intent and meaning in artistic work.

1DD2C732BF6E408E8E817127D6B916D7.description: Use historical and cultural context to structure and justify personal responses to a drama/theatre work.

7EB12E32B5E34F95A708B017D58685EC.description: Responding - Perceive and analyze artistic work.

882AC79E9EF64CE591AC05ED442CA96D.description: Present a drama/theatre production for a specific audience that employs research and analysis grounded in the creative perspectives of the playwright, director, designer, and dramaturg.

84E431B7BAE6416D97DCA28F5E841C39.description: Performing - Convey meaning through the presentation through artistic work.

D1EE3D367B6D453696C36705B712937B.description: Explain and justify the selection of technical elements used to build a design that communicates the concept of a drama/theatre production.

8F5E585C9CB04D6D944B6A31AF726E73.description: Use and justify a collection of acting exercises from reliable resources to prepare a believable and sustainable performance.

D099F275429845E695FAC1388AE06694.description: Performing - Develop and refine artistic techniques and work for presentation.

2EE36D9126324A62BFF6BE8A84014D39.description: Apply a variety of researched acting techniques as an approach to character choices in a drama/theatre work.

AA369D92BF2D4D039A517955E15F3455.description: Apply reliable research of directors’ styles to form unique choices for a directorial concept in a drama/theatre work.

CF3C18085233402890BDA3B10316869B.description: Performing - Select, analyze and interpret artistic work for presentation.

008DFEE414484DB8BE722D371FB44F92.description: Apply a high level of technical proficiencies to the rehearsal process to support the story and emotional impact of a devised or scripted drama/theatre work.

3F50DF1466054F95AF15EA1579D049E4.description: Synthesize ideas from research, script analysis, and context to create a performance that is believable, authentic, and relevant in a drama/theatre work.

30C9465D798A4EECA8E64686A09AE74E.description: Refine, transform, and re-imagine a devised or scripted drama/theatre work using the rehearsal process to invent or re-imagine style, genre, form, and conventions.

E1E70B3DC3BD49DEBFB15AD7020E786A.description: Creating - Refine and complete artistic work.

351789D8A4A346FC9A0D08AEC3E9B7B4.description: Collaborate as a creative team to discover artistic solutions and make interpretive choices in a devised or scripted drama/theatre work.

7F80DE77E6B94C29AFDD44F9C2C1B740.description: Develop and synthesize original ideas in a drama/theatre work utilizing critical analysis, historical and cultural context, research, and western or non-western theatre traditions.

05DCA2386EB4445D8997B5CA66C84C91.description: Creating - Organize and develop artistic ideas and work.

577F280C96FB48169387F232190D408B.description: Integrate cultural and historical contexts with personal experiences to create a character that is believable and authentic, in a drama/ theatre work.

B5866FF20B024DDE91C50B9D768088B4.description: Create a complete design for a drama/ theatre work that incorporates all elements of technology.

C1EF6D63E8E84619B0CED854180E6728.description:
Synthesize
knowledge from a
variety of dramatic
forms, theatrical
conventions, and
technologies to
create the visual
composition of a
drama/ theatre
work.

6A62FD34F3A14CF4817F634112F20266.description: Creating - Generate and conceptualize artistic ideas and work.
